name: Picto-Decoder
description:
Find the code defined by the computer by positioning the various graphic symbols in the good order in a trial minimum.
A code consists of 4 symbols placed in a precise order.

Move pawns with your finger to deposit them in the good column or click simply above for a faster use. Exchange the symbols of 2 columns by making them slide the one on the other one.

You can modify the maximum number of authorized tries to find the code.
Choose the type of symbols that you prefer among cough those proposed.

A simplified version of the game is available on your Apple Watch, to be able to play in any discretion.
In the interface of Apple Watch, click on 4 compartments at the top of the screen to select the symbol to be placed.


Good entertainment!
